name: Shoply E-Commerce App UI Kit
description:
Samples and design previews are free for personal use only.

The screens were flattened and disabled for preview, while the 100% editable designs can be found on my Gumroad & UI8 pages. You can visit them. Buy my product at the link below to access premium, high-quality designs, and commercial use.

Product Information

An e-commerce app UI kit with every use case covered and detailed screens added to it. 


The Shoply UI Kit comes with a practical and detailed style guide that covers all use cases. It's easy to use and easy to edit. With this UI Kit, you can make an awesome e-commerce app. 


What's Inside

  • 130+ high-quality android screens
  • Detailed style guide
  • Modern Light Theme
  • Reusable and editable components
  • Styleguide Included
  • Empty States
  • Pixel Perfect
  • Organized Layers
  • Free Google Font
  • Auto Layout 
  • Used Grid System
  • Easily Drag & Drop Components
